mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prompt (prompt_key, prompt_desc, latest_version, tags, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{promptKey}, #{promptDesc}, #{latestVersion}, #{tags}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM prompt WHERE 1=1
AND prompt_key = #{promptKey}
AND prompt_key LIKE CONCAT('%', #{promptKey}, '%')
AND (tags = #{tag} OR tags LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{tag}, ',%') OR tags LIKE CONCAT(#{tag}, ',%') OR tags LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{tag}))

SELECT p.id, p.prompt_key, p.prompt_desc, p.latest_version, p.tags, p.create_time, p.update_time, pv.status as latest_version_status FROM prompt p LEFT JOIN prompt_version pv ON p.prompt_key = pv.prompt_key AND p.latest_version = pv.version WHERE p.prompt_key = #{promptKey}
